text: It is documented on the filter page <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/hubl-supported-filters>
I gotta say. I think we might need more separation between what is a function  and what is a filter. Sometimes it’s honestly a little confusing.
to clarify I understand what when you use a `|` it’s a filter. I’m just meaning in some cases it’s not clear why something was done as a filter vs a function and vice versa.
Can HubSpot build a Microsoft Flow connector, now that it is opensourced? <https://github.com/Microsoft/PowerPlatformConnectors>

Maybe we could open source the connector?
Do you think it's possible <@UHC710Q1E>? :slightly_smiling_face:

I would love to connect HubSpot to our MS Dynamics 365 CRM, would help out a ton supporting our sales. After reading this: <https://flow.microsoft.com/nl-nl/blog/building-an-ecosystem-of-open-source-connectors/> I thought it might be possible <@U22PKFRU5>
